latestAction.text: By unanimous consent, the Burton amendment was withdrawn.
On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 253 (Roll no. 384).
By unanimous consent, the Burton amendment was withdrawn.
On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote. (text: CR H720)
By unanimous consent, the Burton amendment was withdrawn.

Mr. Young (FL) raised a point of order against the Burton amendment (A006). Mr. Young stated that the amendment sought to change existing law by constituting legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
